skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: A reanimated skeleton, its bones held together by dark magic. The skeleton moves with an eerie, jerking motion, its empty eye sockets glowing with an unnatural light.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.description: A wraith is a spectral, shadowy figure cloaked in flowing darkness. Its glowing eyes pierce the void, and its presence chills the air, draining warmth and light. Gliding silently, it embodies despair and vengeance, cursed to wander endlessly, often wielding ghostly claws or powers to sap life from the living.

drakthul.name: Drakthul
drakthul.description: A fearsome wraith-like creature from the Abyss, Drakthul is bound by silver chains that hold his powerful and shadowy form. His presence is accompanied by an oppressive darkness, and his haunting whispers chill the soul. Once a mighty being of the Abyss, he was imprisoned in an altar to prevent his reign of terror. Now, only fragments of his original power remain, leaking from the cracks in his chains. Drakthul seeks freedom, and he will stop at nothing to break his chains and unleash the abyss upon the world.

ashveil_lynx.name: Ashveil Lynx
ashveil_lynx.description: A mysterious, smoky-gray creature with amber eyes that glow faintly in the mist. It moves with grace and quiet intensity, blending seamlessly with the fog of the forest. As an ancient guardian spirit, it watches over the woods, evoking both awe and reverence in those who encounter it.

sunmane_lion.name: Sunmane Lion
sunmane_lion.description: a majestic, lion-like creature with a golden, glowing mane that seems to shimmer like the sun at dawn. Its fur is a mixture of amber and gold, with faint streaks of light that ripple as it moves, almost like the rays of sunlight filtering through trees. The creature's eyes are deep, radiant pools of amber, and its tail is adorned with tufts of golden fur, resembling a comet's tail.

goblin_guard.name: Goblin Guard
goblin_guard.description: A guardian wielding a greatshield and a sword or axe of the goblin race, have higher defence for a goblin.

goblin_archer.name: Goblin Archer
goblin_archer.description: A nimble goblin marksman equipped with a crude bow and poisoned arrows. Excels at ranged attacks but is frail in close combat.

goblin_barbarian.name: Goblin Barbarian
goblin_barbarian.description: A fierce and reckless goblin warrior wielding a heavy club or axe. Thrives in chaos, dealing high damage but with little regard for defense.

goblin_chieftain_gruknar.name: Goblin Chieftain Gruknar
goblin_chieftain_gruknar.description: The cunning and brutal leader of the goblins, Gruknar wields his authority with a mix of intimidation and raw strength. Armed with a massive, fiery axe, he is a fearsome opponent both in battle and strategy.
